document.full_text: lucas glover won his first title since the 2009 u.s. open by beating his former college team mate jonathan byrd on the first hole of a sudden-death playoff at the quail hollow championship on sunday.
document.title: glover edges byrd in playoff at quail hollow
lines_and_colors: lucas glover won his first title since the 2009 u.s. open by beating his former college team mate jonathan byrd on the first hole of a sudden-death playoff at the quail hollow championship on sunday.
